name: Flora (itch) (Flora1)
description: The game is about a young man that was borne from a special rose petal in a hidden garden. His name is Esor Latep and he is the grand warrior from his bouquet he is going to save the sunflower princess that was kidnap by the Evil Dr.Weevil and his 4 beetles of the apoppylypse. The King P. Malon ask him to save his daughter sens he has the legendary rose Eniv it is a 4 way weapon that is a sword, hammer, wip, and shield. The top of the rose is the hammer and the petals can open up to become the shield also the stem of the rose can be sharp to become the sword or get flimsy to become the wip.
